doc:
George Cole (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Cole_(actor) 0 George Edward Cole, OBE (22 April 1925 – 5 August 2015) was an English actor whose career spanned more than 70 years. He was best known for playing Arthur Daley in the long-running ITV comedy-drama show Minder and Flash Harry in the early St Trinian's films. George_Edward_Cole , OBE ( 22_April_1925 – 5_August_2015 ) was an_English_actor whose_career spanned more_than_70_years .
